TopicTitle: No New Years Thread? This Must Be Remedied!

Articles.Content:
I can't believe 2013 is already over. Went by so fast.

So, what are your plans for 2014? Resolutions, anyone?
I'm going to the gym to pack on some muscles.

I whipped up a 2014 card thing, for when the time comes.

[RESERVED FOR WHEN TIME COMES]

Happy New Years Eve!
This is the final time I'm posting this screenshot!

I'm not superstitious, but it looks like 2014 will be a good year for me. Evidently, finding a spider in your house is a good omen. Finding one spinning a web is an omen for increased income. And finally, it was on the wall, meaning some wish of mine is supposed to come true. Three positive things less than two hours into 2014? Keep it coming.

And finally, it was on the wall, meaning some wish of mine is supposed to come true. Three positive things less than two hours into 2014? Keep it coming.

Happy New Year, everyone!

Happy T-(what?)21 days until the Chinese New Year.
